:::{#jaron-heading}
I'm a biostatistician and data scientist working at the [UCLA Jonsson Comprehensive Cancer
Center](https://www.uclahealth.org/cancer) in [Dr. Paul Boutros' Cancer Data Science lab](https://www.uclahealth.org/departments/urology/iuo/research/faculty-labs/dr-paul-boutros-lab).

I'm passionate about using statistics, data science, and software development to advance cancer research and improve public health.
:::
